net.opentsdb.query.expression

接口 Expression

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Absolute, Alias, DiffSeries, DivideSeries, HighestCurrent, HighestMax, MovingAverage, MultiplySeries, Scale, SumSeries, TimeShift

    public interface Expression
    The interface for various expressions/functions used when querying OpenTSDB.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.3

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DataPoints[] evaluate(TSQuery data_query, List<DataPoints[]> results, List<String> params)
      Computes a set of results given the results of a TSQuery that may include multiple metrics and/or group by result sets.
      String writeStringField(List<String> params, String inner_expression)
      TODO - document me!

    • 方法详细资料

      • evaluate

        DataPoints[] evaluate(TSQuery data_query,
                      List<DataPoints[]> results,
                      List<String> params)
        Computes a set of results given the results of a TSQuery that may include multiple metrics and/or group by result sets.
        参数:
        data_query - The original query from the user
        results - The results of the query
        params - Parameters parsed from the expression endpoint related to the implementing function
        返回:
        An array of data points resulting from the implementation
